CustomField.formula: ( Last_FY_Q2_HC__c + Last_FY_Q2_SC__c + Last_FY_Q2_PSC__c + X2_FY_Ago_Q2_HC__c + X2_FY_Ago_Q2_SC__c + X2_FY_Ago_Q2_PSC__c + X3_FY_Ago_Q2_HC__c + X3_FY_Ago_Q2_SC__c + X3_FY_Ago_Q2_PSC__c ) / 3
CustomField.inlineHelpText: average of Q2 total combined credits last 3 FYs based on NPSP roll-ups, for strategic plan metrics
CustomField.label: Q2 Avg Last 3 FY
